metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8783 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
tif_luv.c in libtiff allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds reads) via a crafted TIFF image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.4').
